author: Walfun

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
# Introduction **Hello Minetest user, are you looking for a texture pack that changes the default + and X crosshair to a square shaped? Well lucky for you, becuase I made a texture pack that replaces the + and X crosshair to the outline square crosshair. I hope you enjoy my very first texture pack.
**-Walfun # Changelogs - v0.1: Release.
- v0.2: Change the description a bit and is now compatible with GreenXenthin's [Mobile Crosshair](https://content.minetest.net/packages/GreenXenith/mobile_crosshair/) mod.
name: outline_square_crosshair
short_description: It replaces the + and X crosshair to the outline square crosshair.
title: Outline Square Crosshair
